title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.3 - Prohibited floor covering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.3 - Prohibited floor covering

State Regulations

Sawdust, wood shavings, granular salt, baked clay, diatomaceous earth or similar materials shall not be used as floor coverings; however, these materials may be used in amounts necessary for immediate spot
clean-up of spills or drippage on floors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
